snippet: Vitaly Churkin, the Russian diplomat blocking United Nations action on Syria, played a very different role during the war in Bosnia.
abstract: Vitaly Churkin, the Russian diplomat blocking United Nations action on Syria, played a very different role during the war in Bosnia.
lead_paragraph: As my colleague Neil MacFarquhar reports, Russia's envoy to the United Nations has refused to endorse a Security Council resolution that calls for President Bashar al-Assad of Syria to step down.

headline.main: Russian Diplomat Blocking U.N. Action in Syria Facilitated It in Bosnia

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
